descriptionNullable:
# Mercari Japanese Item Sales Dataset 🛍 This dataset contains items listed and sold on Mercari Japanese [website](http://mercari.jp) offering a unique glimpse into the world of e-commerce on the website. The data is intentionally structured similar to that of the official Price Suggestion Challenge [on Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/mercari-price-suggestion-challenge) held 7 years ago, aiming at the successive transfer of knowledge and technique. It's that this dataset is completely renewed and has more predictors/features in it. It may be used for various tasks including classification, regression, natural language processing, and price prediction. Non commercial use only. I hope next generation of data engineers, ah hopefully that includes me, find this interesting. ## Data Overview: - **Content:** List of sold items on Mercari Japanese website - **Source:** In-house web scraper via official web interface - **Number of samples:** about 867,700 (one item per row) - **Data format:** TSV - **Encoding:** UTF-8 ## Feature Description: | Feature Name | Description | Data Type | |-----------------------|----------------------------------------------------|-----------------| | **id** | Obfuscated item identifier | str | | **is_shop** | Indicates if the seller is a shop
(0 = n; 1 = y) | int/bool | | **name** | Item name | str | | **item_description** | Item's description | str | | **price** | Listed price (yen) of the item | int | | **brand_name** | Item brand (if available) | str/categorical | | **item_condition** | Item's condition (e.g., new, used,...) | int/categorical | | **shipping** | Who pays for shipping
(0 = buyer; 1 = seller) | int/bool | | **shipping_from_area**| Area where the item ships from | int/categorical | | **shipping_duration** | Estimated shipping time | int/categorical | | **seller_id** | Obfuscated seller identifier | str | | **category_name** | Categories
(levels are separated by "/") | str/categorical
/concatenated | | **updated_date** | Last updated date
(rounded by 4 hours) | date | ## Important Notes: - This dataset is made public for educational purpose. Non-commercial use only - This dataset includes items across all categories - Certain data points were anonymized (`seller_id`, `item_id`) or removed (`images`, `update_time`, `description`, etc...) from original materials to prevent misuse - Brand IDs and category IDs have been replaced with corresponding names for easier use - Sellers and items are obfuscated but still identifiable by manually searching it on the original website ## Contact: If you find this dataset valuable or have suggestions, share your finding with the Kaggle community. Also feel free to [contact me](mailto:hyamamoto2000@gmail.com). - This dataset is currently on beta. Do you want some Kaggle competition with this? - Do you want other features imported from original data source? ## Future Data Acquisition: The dataset is intended to be updated over time.
title: Mercari Japanese Dataset
subtitle: Item sales dataset for price-prediction/classification/NLP
description:
# Mercari Japanese Item Sales Dataset 🛍 This dataset contains items listed and sold on Mercari Japanese [website](http://mercari.jp) offering a unique glimpse into the world of e-commerce on the website. The data is intentionally structured similar to that of the official Price Suggestion Challenge [on Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/mercari-price-suggestion-challenge) held 7 years ago, aiming at the successive transfer of knowledge and technique. It's that this dataset is completely renewed and has more predictors/features in it. It may be used for various tasks including classification, regression, natural language processing, and price prediction. Non commercial use only. I hope next generation of data engineers, ah hopefully that includes me, find this interesting. ## Data Overview: - **Content:** List of sold items on Mercari Japanese website - **Source:** In-house web scraper via official web interface - **Number of samples:** about 867,700 (one item per row) - **Data format:** TSV - **Encoding:** UTF-8 ## Feature Description: | Feature Name | Description | Data Type | |-----------------------|----------------------------------------------------|-----------------| | **id** | Obfuscated item identifier | str | | **is_shop** | Indicates if the seller is a shop
(0 = n; 1 = y) | int/bool | | **name** | Item name | str | | **item_description** | Item's description | str | | **price** | Listed price (yen) of the item | int | | **brand_name** | Item brand (if available) | str/categorical | | **item_condition** | Item's condition (e.g., new, used,...) | int/categorical | | **shipping** | Who pays for shipping
(0 = buyer; 1 = seller) | int/bool | | **shipping_from_area**| Area where the item ships from | int/categorical | | **shipping_duration** | Estimated shipping time | int/categorical | | **seller_id** | Obfuscated seller identifier | str | | **category_name** | Categories
(levels are separated by "/") | str/categorical
/concatenated | | **updated_date** | Last updated date
(rounded by 4 hours) | date | ## Important Notes: - This dataset is made public for educational purpose. Non-commercial use only - This dataset includes items across all categories - Certain data points were anonymized (`seller_id`, `item_id`) or removed (`images`, `update_time`, `description`, etc...) from original materials to prevent misuse - Brand IDs and category IDs have been replaced with corresponding names for easier use - Sellers and items are obfuscated but still identifiable by manually searching it on the original website ## Contact: If you find this dataset valuable or have suggestions, share your finding with the Kaggle community. Also feel free to [contact me](mailto:hyamamoto2000@gmail.com). - This dataset is currently on beta. Do you want some Kaggle competition with this? - Do you want other features imported from original data source? ## Future Data Acquisition: The dataset is intended to be updated over time.
